Question: Tianjin  Lishen Battery Joint-Stock Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tianjin Lishen Battery Joint-Stock Co., Ltd

Product: Cylindrical Lithium Ion Cell LR1865LD

 - First lithium-ion battery R&D firm and manufacturer in China
 - 26 years of experience in the industry
 - High-quality lithium-ion batteries for electric vehicles, energy storage, and portable electronics
 - Strategic cooperation agreements with business partners
 - Technology center establishment with Siemens Digital Industries Software support
 - CES 2024 presence at booth No.55745

(Note: The summary focuses on the product highlight and specifications relevant to the CES 2024 event and the company's expertise in the field of lithium-ion batteries.)
